Hacker Game

The hacker game is an hacking simulation game. In this game you have to find, and decrypt/decode if is necessary, a password, hidden in the level page!

This game has 20 levels and is divided in five different sections:

  • HTML
  • JavaScript
  • Encoding & Encryption
  • Steganography
  • MySQL Injection

Play it now!
